Hiten nip̀resvia: ǹte titheòtokos Eth-ouab Maria: Pchois arih̀mot nan m̀pikhō èvol ǹte nennovi.
Hiten nip̀resvia: ǹte p̀iàrkhiàngelos Eth-ouab: Mikhail p̀àrkhōn ǹna nifiouì :Pchois...
Hiten nip̀resvia: ǹte pishashf ǹàrkhiàngelos: nem nitagma ǹèpouranion: Pchois...
Hiten nip̀resvia: ǹte pip̀rodromos m̀vaptistis: Iōannis pireftiōms: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte nachois ǹioti ǹàpostolos: nem p̀sepi ǹte nimathitis: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte pitheṑrimos ǹèyàngelistis: Markos piàpostolos: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte piàrkhidiakōn èts̀marōout: S̀tefanos pishorp m̀martyros: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte piàthloforos m̀martyros: pachois p̀ouro Geṑrgios: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte piàthloforos m̀martyros: Theòdōros pis̀t̀ratilatis: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte piàthloforos m̀martyros: Filopatir Merkourios: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte piàthloforos m̀martyros: ava Mina ǹte niFaiat: Pchois...
Hiten nièykhi: ǹte niEth-ouab ǹte paièhoou: piouai piouai kata pefran: Pchois...
Hiten nouèykhi: àreh èp̀ōnkh m̀penōit ettaiiout ǹàrkhièrevs: papa ava Shenouda :Pchois arih̀mot nan m̀pikhō èvol ǹte nennovi.
Tenouōsht m̀mok ṑ PEkrestos: nem Pekiōt ǹàgathos: nem piP̀pnevma Eth-ouab: je (aktōnk / akì) aksōti m̀mon nai nan.
